text: Greater Valparaíso (Gran Valparaíso) is a metropolitan area located in the Valparaíso Region. The name comes from the city of Valparaíso, the most important harbour in Chile. At the 2012 census, the estimated population was 979,127 people.Censo 2012 - Instituto Nacional de Estadísticas .
